# dynamicAspectRatio

**Instance Property**

A key-value observable property indicating the current aspect ratio for a device.

## Declaration

```swift
var dynamicAspectRatio: AVCaptureDevice.AspectRatio? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is initialized to the first [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/AspectRatio] listed in the device’s activeFormat’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/Format/supportedDynamicAspectRatios] property. If the activeFormat’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/Format/supportedDynamicAspectRatios] is an empty array, this property returns nil.

## Configuring dynamic aspect ratio

- **setDynamicAspectRatio(_:completionHandler:)**: Updates the dynamic aspect ratio of the device.
- **AVCaptureDevice.AspectRatio**: String constants describing the different video aspect ratios you can configure for a particular device.
- **dynamicDimensions**: A key-value observable property describing the output dimensions of the video buffer based on the device’s dynamic aspect ratio.
